name: Wren Shoulderpads
description:
"We're under constant attack, so we have to be constantly on our guard."
—Lightbringer Zykk

name: Cloth Beetletun Chestpiece
description:
"It's the height of Beetletun style! Well, it was last year, anyway."
—Paden

name: Seraph-Issue Greaves
description:
"Two things are seemingly endless: centaurs to kill, and our supply of leggings."
—Erika Rane

name: Heavy Garrison Gloves
description:
"You sure earned your pay on this one."
—Lieutenant Ryder

name: Kohlopoi Aquabreather
description:
"Enjoy the bubbles!"
—Varonos Parump

name: Leather Trading Stompers
description:
"Let's make a deal."
—Lexi Price

description:

name: Seraph-Issue Pauldrons
description:
"People should take shoulder protection more seriously. One arrow volley will change your opinion on a good pair of pauldrons."
—Tripp

name: Fancy Triskellian Breather
description:
"We modified these to help defend ourselves against krait."
—Mayor Trisk

name: Seraph-Issue Gauntlets
description:

—Barnaby
